about_the_game:
Get yourself in a vacation mood and enjoy the exotic vibes of the Far East with our lovely Asian themed DLC that brings an exclusive pet, interior decorations and skins for buildings!

New Pet
A very special guest came all the way from Asia to visit your farm: a super cute dwarf squirrel wants to be your new friend! Enjoy all your upcoming adventures with the most cuddly little companion of all.



Interior decoration
Discover the most beautiful Asian themed furniture and decoration for your farm house. Get a new cozy bed, a loveable seating area, an amazing new window and floor design as well as exotic new decoration pieces like plants, mirrors and pictures.



Building skins
Beautiful from the inside and from the outside. Transform your farm house, the well and the windmill with a unique Asian themed design!
detailed_description:
Get yourself in a vacation mood and enjoy the exotic vibes of the Far East with our lovely Asian themed DLC that brings an exclusive pet, interior decorations and skins for buildings!

New Pet
A very special guest came all the way from Asia to visit your farm: a super cute dwarf squirrel wants to be your new friend! Enjoy all your upcoming adventures with the most cuddly little companion of all.



Interior decoration
Discover the most beautiful Asian themed furniture and decoration for your farm house. Get a new cozy bed, a loveable seating area, an amazing new window and floor design as well as exotic new decoration pieces like plants, mirrors and pictures.



Building skins
Beautiful from the inside and from the outside. Transform your farm house, the well and the windmill with a unique Asian themed design!

  • Processor: Dual-Core: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: This is additional content for Big Farm Story, but does not include the base game.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Czech, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
